Compliance FAQ

Do we need permits for temporary puddle kiosks?

Usually yes. We pre-fill packet CL-9 and route to municipal review with a same-day ceremonial stamp.

Can wedding venues join municipal pilots?

Yes, provided exits remain clear and heel sink-risk stays below 3.2 in the Alliance Friction Index.

What does “non-extractive pooling” mean?

No siphoning. Value comes from licensing, naming rights, and guided viewing corridors.
